remarks: The norm on a subspace in terms of the norm on the parent space. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
sspn.y $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
sspn.n $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
sspn.m $e |- M = ( normCV ` W ) $.
sspn.h $e |- H = ( SubSp ` U ) $.
sspnval $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. H /\ A e. Y ) -> ( M ` A ) = ( N ` A ) ) $.
